name: format_x
abstract: A polymorphic, variadic string formatting fuction which takes named parameters
description: This `format_x` function produces output formatted according to a format string (in a style similar to the C function `sprintf`). This `format_x` is an extension of the built-in `format` function, as it is string interpolation with named format parameters.

format_x.abstract: A polymorphic, variadic string formatting function which takes named parameters
